## TuningHyperparameters interface

Hyperparameters for model tuning.

**Signature:**

```typescript

```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [batch\_size?](./generative-ai.tuninghyperparameters.batch_size.md) |  | number | _(Optional)_ The size of the batch used for training. |
